column1: jesse lee cook| mr. jesse lee cook
column7: 2015 at his home. he was a native of hamburg
column9: a former 30 year resident of oakland
column11: and a resident of crossett for the past few years. he was a retired construction worker
column12: a member of living word c. o. g. i. c. and was a us army veteran. he was preceded in death by his parents
column13: jesse lee and roxie anna robinson cook
column14: two brothers: jimmy joe and sam cook
column16: annie lou cook. jesse was an amazing musician who loved playing the organ. he is survived by one son
column26: nephews other relatives and friends. funeral services are wednesday
